articles.description: With both teams heading into the game looking for a much needed win, Baylor's Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. slams home the go-ahead dunk with 10 seconds left in double overtime to give the Bears a 74-73 victory.
articles.headline: Baylor edges Texas in 2OT thriller

images.caption: With both teams heading into the game looking for a much needed win, Baylor's Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. slams home the go-ahead dunk with 10 seconds left in double overtime to give the Bears a 74-73 victory.
images.name: Baylor edges Texas in 2OT thriller

articles.description: Dennis Jones had 22 points and Zachary Hamilton scored five of his 11 points in overtime to help Prairie View A&M beat Jackson State 63-58 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Jones, Hamilton help PVAMU beat Jackson St. 63-58 in OT

articles.description: Jo Lual-Acuil Jr.'s follow-up dunk with 8 seconds left in double overtime sent Baylor to a 74-73 win over Texas on Monday night, the fourth straight victory for the resurgent Bears after a miserable start to the Big 12 season.
articles.headline: Baylor tops Texas 74-73 in double OT

images.caption: With both teams heading into the game looking for a much needed win, Baylor's Jo Lual-Acuil Jr. slams home the go-ahead dunk with 10 seconds left in double overtime to give the Bears a 74-73 victory.
images.name: Baylor edges Texas in 2OT thriller

articles.description: A.J. Mosby had 22 points on 9-of-11 shooting, including 4 of 5 from 3-point range, and Dante Sterling scored 15 points to help Alcorn State beat Arkansas-Pine Bluff 84-52 on Monday night.
articles.headline: Mosby scores 22, Alcorn State hits 12 3s in win over UAPB

articles.description: Baylor head coach Scott Drew breaks down the importance of his team's victory and how hard his players fought in the Bears' 74-73 double overtime victory over Texas.
articles.headline: Drew 'proud' of his team

images.caption: Baylor head coach Scott Drew breaks down the importance of his team's victory and how hard his players fought in the Bears' 74-73 double overtime victory over Texas.
images.name: Drew 'proud' of his team

articles.description: Tiwian Kendley scored 24 points and Morgan State held Florida A&M to 18 first-half points on its way to a 74-48 win on Monday night.
articles.headline: Morgan State dominates Florida A&M 74-48

videos.description: Sagaba Konate sends a layup into the stands for the Mountaineeers.
videos.headline: Konate rejects Mykhailiuk off backboard

videos.description: Kansas' Udoka Azubuike rocks the rim and then gets called for a technical foul for taunting his defender.
videos.headline: Azubuike dunks and gets a tech

videos.description: Sagaba Konate gets another huge block, this time on a big dunk attempt by Sviatsoslav Mykhailiuk.
videos.headline: WVU's Konate denies Mykhailiuk hard

videos.description: Sagaba Konate gets the crowd going with another block for the Mountaineers, his 5th of the 1st half.
videos.headline: Konate gets another massive block

videos.description: Sagaba Konate has been protecting the rim against Kansas with 5 blocks in the first half.
videos.headline: West Virginia's Konate has a block party

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (West Virginia's Konate has a block party) 2018/01/15 ESHEET

videos.description: Sviatsoslav Mykhailiuk sets up Udoka Azubuike on the run for the big time alley-oop.
videos.headline: Azubuike throws down alley-oop for Kansas

videos.description: KU's Devonte' Graham tries to keep his team in it with a steal and draws the foul on the and-1 bucket.
videos.headline: Graham steal leads to tough and-1

videos.description: Devonte' Graham is left all alone in the corner to tie the game at 59 with a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Graham ties it with open 3 for KU

videos.description: Sviatsoslav Mykhailiuk cuts to the hoop and gets the bucket putting the Jayhawks back up 65-64.
videos.headline: Mykhailiuk finger-rolls to get KU back in front

videos.description: Devonte' Graham and Kansas head coach Bill Self explain how they were able to keep it close with West Virginia and rally in the 2nd half.
videos.headline: Self: 'We shot miserably until it counted'
